alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 18 at 1:05PM AKST until December 20 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT AKST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with localized amounts up to 10 inches, and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch are expected. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...6 PM today to midnight Sunday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
